gen:link.msg:message: The reported value of `Equity` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `AdjustedEquityAfterRecalculation` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `EquityMovement`, because `EquityDirectlyChangeAccountingPolicies` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PrecondEquityDirectlyChangeAccountingPolicies')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_PrecondEquityDirectlyChangeAccountingPolicies return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_EEquity')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_EEquity return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_SAdjustedEquityAfterRecalculation')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_SAdjustedEquityAfterRecalculation return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_EquityMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_EquityMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

The reported value of `Equity` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `AdjustedEquityAfterRecalculation` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `EquityMovement`, because `EquityDirectlyMaterialErrors` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_PrecondEquityDirectlyMaterialErrors')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_PrecondEquityDirectlyMaterialErrors return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_EEquity')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_EEquity return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_SAdjustedEquityAfterRecalculation')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_SAdjustedEquityAfterRecalculation return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_EquityMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1ExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_EquityMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

The reported value of `Equity` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `Equity` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `EquityMovement`, because `EquityDirectlyChangeAccountingPolicies` is not reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_EEquity')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_EEquity return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_SEquity')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_SEquity return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_EquityMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_EquityMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

The reported value of `Equity` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `Equity` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `EquityMovement`, because `EquityDirectlyMaterialErrors` is not reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_EEquity')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_EEquity return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_SEquity')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_SEquity return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_EquityMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1NoExistenceThnPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd2_EquityMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`AdjustedEquityAfterRecalculation` SHOULD be equal to + `Equity` + `EquityDirectlyChangeAccountingPolicies` + `EquityDirectlyMaterialErrors`, because `EquityDirectlyChangeAccountingPolicies` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1ExistenceThn03Variables1_PrecondEquityDirectlyChangeAccountingPolicies')))) then ((for $v in @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`AdjustedEquityAfterRecalculation` SHOULD exist at least once within the same context, because `EquityDirectlyChangeAccountingPolicies` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtExistenceThnExistence1E1_EquityDirectlyChangeAccountingPolicies')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtExistenceThnExistence1E1_EquityDirectlyChangeAccountingPolicies return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`AdjustedEquityAfterRecalculation` SHOULD exist at least once within the same context, because `EquityDirectlyMaterialErrors` is reported. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtExistenceThnExistence1E2_EquityDirectlyMaterialErrors')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtExistenceThnExistence1E2_EquityDirectlyMaterialErrors return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`EquityMember` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying children members. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`EquityMember` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying children members. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`EquityMovement` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_EquityMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_EquityMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfEquityMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfEquityMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfEquityMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfEquityMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Equity` reported with `ClassesOfEquityAxis` and `EquityMember` SHOULD be equal to `Equity` without `ClassesOfEquityAxis` and EquityMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit8_Set02ClassesOfEquityAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit8_Set02ClassesOfEquityAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit8_Set01ClassesOfEquityAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit8_Set01ClassesOfEquityAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Equity` reported with `ClassesOfEquityAxis` and `LegalStatutoryReservesMember` SHOULD be equal to `LegalStatutoryReserves` without `ClassesOfEquityAxis` and LegalStatutoryReservesMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit4_Set02ClassesOfEquityAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit4_Set02ClassesOfEquityAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit4_Set01ClassesOfEquityAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit4_Set01ClassesOfEquityAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Equity` reported with `ClassesOfEquityAxis` and `ReservesOtherMember` SHOULD be equal to `ReservesOther` without `ClassesOfEquityAxis` and ReservesOtherMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit5_Set02ClassesOfEquityAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit5_Set02ClassesOfEquityAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit5_Set01ClassesOfEquityAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit5_Set01ClassesOfEquityAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Equity` reported with `ClassesOfEquityAxis` and `ResultForTheYearMember` SHOULD be equal to `ResultForTheYear` without `ClassesOfEquityAxis` and ResultForTheYearMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit7_Set02ClassesOfEquityAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit7_Set02ClassesOfEquityAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit7_Set01ClassesOfEquityAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit7_Set01ClassesOfEquityAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Equity` reported with `ClassesOfEquityAxis` and `RevaluationReserveMember` SHOULD be equal to `RevaluationReserve` without `ClassesOfEquityAxis` and RevaluationReserveMember| {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02ClassesOfEquityAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set02ClassesOfEquityAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01ClassesOfEquityAxis')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesEquityStatementOfChangesHousing_PrtFST1FactExplicitEQFactNonExplicit1_Set01ClassesOfEquityAxis return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
